logentry.author: scriswellwsf
logentry.msg: CBECC 2025 (1350) executables and ruleset & UI source w/ addition of NEM3 adjustments to LSC results for exports (of elec) to the grid - new inputs on PV/Battery tab of Project dialog to specify NEM type (none, NEM3-LSC or NEM3-ACC (latest Avoided Cost Calculator version)) - 2025 analysis only

logentry.author: scriswellwsf
logentry.msg: MFam user support fix - prevent activating StdDsgnSolarSysReqd (std design solar thermal system) for ResDHWSys systems that are NOT 'New' (such as Altered)

logentry.author: jireh360
logentry.msg: Ticket #3607 Optimum Start Behavior - Stop modeling optimum start in EnergyPlus - maintain the mandatory check and report of optimum start control

logentry.author: scriswellwsf
logentry.msg: CBECC 2022/25 (1352) executables with rules processor (2D interpolation lookup table) features and 2028 SSP2 & SSP3 weather files and ruleset/UI updates enabling their test - addition of SSP2 and SSP3 2028 weather file sets, access to weather file set option on project dialog ('25 executable INI w/ EnableResearchMode toggled on to enable weather file set testing) - ability to use look-up tables for input range checking and 2D interpolation (of HtPumpV3 performance parameters) - other HtPumpV3 mods still in progress - ruleset fix: added checks to prevent rule eval errors when ResDistSys:HERSCheck is not created/assigned (happens when assigned flr area = 0)
